item.description:
Hi everyone,

OK, due to the weather forcast I have moved this to next Sunday, 24 May 2009.

The plan is to get the 10.15am train from North Station to Rockport and ride around the waterfront at Rockport, possibly even heading to Salem.

The 10.15 train will get is to Rockport at about 11.30 if there is anyone that would prefer to drive.

Please update your RSVPS so I know who to look out or at North Station tomorrow morning.

Cheers,
Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Bike Ride - Rockport
